fields.name: Stake Amount
fields.description: Some WEEV must be given as collateral to discourage malicious behavior

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Provide a name to identify and describe the registry

fields.name: Stake per Registration
fields.description: Set the amount in WEEV device owners must stake as collateral when registering a device. This helps ensure the data can be trusted

fields.name: Stake per Validator
fields.description: Set the amount in WEEV validator's must stake as collateral. Validator's check that devices conform to registry standards

fields.name: Stake per Arbiter
fields.description: Set the amount in WEEV arbiter's must stake as collateral. Arbiters serve the purpose of dispute resolution on specific transaction types
